sentences.english: They looked at long-term sick leave (of over 90 days) and hospital admission rates.

sentences.english: This part is also the key point of this article. It is divides into three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 该部分也是本文的重点所在，分为三个方面。

sentences.english: The superior natural conditions of Wannan mountainous region make it one of China's better tea producing regions.
sentences.chinese: 皖南山区自然条件优越，是我国重点产茶区之一。

sentences.english: Let your focus be on guiding your children to develop actual discipline.
sentences.chinese: 让你的重点落在指导孩子形成真正的纪律自制上来。

sentences.english: This year, we need to focus on the following five areas.
sentences.chinese: 年内要重点抓好五个方面。

sentences.english: At last it puts forward the countermeasures to the development of tea industrialization in Ying Shan County.

sentences.english: The next generation of groupware tools focused on these communications problems.

sentences.english: Key enterprises have made great progress in making up deficits and getting surpluses.
sentences.chinese: 重点企业扭亏增盈有较大进展。

sentences.english: The main option I focus on in this article is the inline editor switch.
sentences.chinese: 本文将重点讲述的主要选项是行内编辑器开关。

sentences.english: Thus, we have chosen to focus these articles on free-form text.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们把本系列的重点放在形式自由的文本上。

sentences.english: Another important aspect of functional genomics is the research on human disease - related genes.
sentences.chinese: 功能基因组学另一个研究重点是人类疾病相关基因。
